=== Dancing with Ubuntu: A Brief History ===
I've been professionally involved with systems engineering for the better part of a decade; going from systems administration on Windows, to FreeBSD, to CentOS, to Debian, to Ubuntu has been an interesting ride that's taken me to some relatively interesting places.
